text: Muiz ud din Qaiqabad (1269 â€“ 1 February 1290) was the tenth sultan of the Mamluk dynasty (Slave dynasty). He reigned 1287 to 1 February 1290. He was the grandson of Balban and was put on the throne by Fakruddin who was the kotwal of Delhi. Category:1260s births Category:1290 deaths Category:Mamluk dynasty (Delhi) Category:Indian Muslims
title: Muiz ud din Qaiqabad
